_aArchiveFileTree: NOBLOCK IS RECOMMENDED FOR THIS MAP!!!.txt

_sText:
**ba jail sand made by VeMi**
===============================

A middle sized map aimed from a basic, easy design point of view for fun gaming on prisonbreak servers.

This map features:
------------------
- Climb
- Bhop
- Jumprope
- ManCannon Game
- Jump Game
- Minefield
- Basket Dunk
- Pool
- 2 secrets
- Cool rewards
- Nice CT-Control environment that follows with T rebellion environment!

In order to play this map properly, install NoBlock on your server either for SourceMod or Mani Admin! 

Got suggestions for v4? Email them to uberpwn4@hotmail.se
